document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

subSubSection.paragraph: • In : Proceedings of the Royal Irish Academy , 31: 68.
Irish Records : Under bark and in pine cones ( Halbert, 1915 ).
• In : Mitteilungen aus dem Zoologischen Museum in Berlin , 38: 36.
• In : Acarologie , Schriftenreihe für Vergleichende Milbenkunde , 3: 26.
• In : Acarologie , Schriftenreihe für Vergleichende Milbenkunde , 3: 17.

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Digamasellus scotarius Sheals
( Curry, 1970 , 1971 ), Den-

Irish Records : Pasture ( Curry, 1969a , 1970 , 1971 ; Bolger, 1980); pasture on peat ( Whelan, 1976 ); dune, pasture,
Iris
bog, gorse bank and
Salix
ditch at seashore ( Purvis, 1982 ); soil under Leyland cypress, Sitka spruce and pasture (unpublished data).
• In : Proceedings of the Royal Irish Academy , 35, 117.

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Gamasellus inermis Halbert (Halbert, 1920)
.
Irish Records : In fissures and between stone flakes at seashore ( Halbert, 1920 ).
